Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20125096 TCK, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 1 & 3 On 5th Corp. d.b.a Fabiane’s Café & Pastry, to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 142 North 5th Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no.34.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
